message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $16,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your product, but I am looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $14,000?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget concerns.  To make this work, I could come down to $15,000. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product.
Thank you for adjusting your price, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to propose a price of $14,500 for the product.
